#################################################

About the game:

Search for flavorful and exotic ingredients to customize your own chocolate creations and amass a fortune in the post-war boom! In Chocolatier - Decadence by Design, you have complete control over the ingredients, look, and name/description of your customized recipes. Travel to ports around the world to discover ingredients, build your empire, and follow the continuing saga of the Baumeister family. How you customize your chocolates has an economic impact on your success, so create what you (and the people you meet) crave in Chocolatier - Decadence by Design!
